view.title: Configure default pricing rules
view.subtitle: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Pricing completed
blocks.message: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.
